Reviews.Title: Im enjoying it
Reviews.Author: tada tada "omgjebus"
Reviews.Content: Im loving this phone looks great, performs pretty good, but took me a while to figure out how to transfer files since I am using a mac and the white color looks nice but didn't think it was worth the extra 30. If your a business i would recommend it as an alternative to a blackberry which everyone uses or your tired of touch screens and just want to use a qwerty keyboard type phone. So far so good.

Reviews.Title: Is good
Reviews.Author: Fernando Bustillos
Reviews.Content: In my opinion is very good this product. I like it!!!! I Hope buy in other opportunity in the same store

Reviews.Title: nice item
Reviews.Author: Marco
Reviews.Content: Very good article, very good deal nice, very good price, item arrived on time, the packaging had an acceptable size

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: e72
Reviews.Content: is a nice phone I love it. My last phone it were e71 but e 72 is malefic :D sorry about my english but I'm so excited

Reviews.Title: Perfect for business after a year using it...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I used this phone for a year now and it's perfect for business.  Some nice touchs (like muting the incoming call by turning the phone over), two interchangeable profiles (complete with themes, sounds, menus, etc.) for use at home and at office, the QWERTY keyboard and very strong construction, and the possibility of creating "groups" of wireless connection you authorize for Internet connection, made me very happy of my selection.Ideal for business and SOHO workers like me.

Reviews.Title: Overpriced flashlight
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Pros:-3mm jack versus the E71-Secondary camera for self portraits-Thin, lightweight and white/silver version gets many compliments-Music player and texting functions are intuitive (although "I" is not automatically capitalized as with other phones)-Built in internet radio-Great battery life-Holding the space bar down is the command for the handy flashlightCons:-After a month, the Wi-Fi scanner would produce a "Script Error" and the E72 would freeze until the battery was removed and restarted again which defeats buying an unlocked phone-GPS never worked quite right and then stopped altogether along with the e-mail alert function and the ability to upload music-5MP camera takes grainy images-Poor call quality-Nokia is impossible to get a hold of and is not concerned with the E72's unstable platform

Reviews.Title: an updated version (E6) will be available soon
Reviews.Author: Zafer Aktan
Reviews.Content: An updated version (E6) will be available later this year. Unless the price will be your major point of interest, I recommend waiting until E6 arrives.  For E71 owners, don't buy this phone as an update - but wait for E6 as well.  With latest firmware updates and purchasing a new battery - there is really no good reason to upgrade from E71 to E72.  If you need to buy now for some reason, consider purchasing E71 instead.  It has better built quality.

Reviews.Title: Bad keypad
Reviews.Author: Marco "MMM"
Reviews.Content: Just receive this product and came with a deffective keypad, the central key is not working properly. Shame for nokia

Reviews.Title: Recomendado 100%
Reviews.Author: Xiohenny
Reviews.Content: El telefono esta hermoso, practico y muy util, me encanta...El telefono Nokia es lo mejor del mercado, no tiene nada que envidiar...

Reviews.Title: Poor quality of materials and fragility of the device, badly assembled
Reviews.Author: Chrix
Reviews.Content: I got an Nokia E71, upstanding quality, hard, heavy, very well build, made in Finland.Having the same thought I got the Nokia E72, too fragile, too light, very badly assembled, low quality and made in China.I would not recommend to get Nokia Phones made in China. This is not the first fiasco with Nokias made in China.Too bad that in order to make things cheaper Nokia good name now is going down the hill.Before you buy anything form Nokia, ask where it is made..You can see, feel and hear the difference. Do not buy anything was not assembled or made in Finland, you will regret if you do, in the same way I am sad, disappointed and mad. (When you have in your hands devices made in Finland and in China (Cheap labour mean cheap products, unhappy workers would never do a good job)Thanks.

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and US/International 3G compatibility via 850/1900/2100 UMTS/HSDPA plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
Push e-mail and calendars via Microsoft Exchange and Lotus Notes Traveler; full QWERTY keyboard with Optical Navi key for more intuitive navigation
GPS with free Ovi Maps and voice navigation ; 5-megapixel camera/camcorder; stereo Bluetooth; Wi-Fi networking (802.11b/g)
Up to 12.5 hours of GSM talk time (5.9 on 3G networks), up to 576 hours (24 days) of standby time
What's in the Box: handset, rechargeable battery, charger, connectivity cable, bluetooth and wired headsets, mobile holder, lanyard, pouch, printed documentation
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia E72 Unlocked Phone with gps navigation and Free Voice Navigation -- U.S. Version with Warranty (White)
